metadata.title: CVE-2023-40305 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
GNU indent 2.2.13 has a heap-based buffer overflow in search_brace inindent.c via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40305` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

indent - 2.2.12-1ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: indent package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.12-1ubuntu0.20.04.1').
